Package nux.xom.tests

Tests and example demos.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BinaryXMLConverter Command-line demo that converts a set of standard textual XML files to and from binary xml (bnux) files; Bnux files are indicated by a ".bnux" file name extension.
XQueryCommand Nux XQuery test tool with optional schema validation, XInclude and update facility; See the online help for a description of all available options, plus examples.
XQueryTestSuiteW3C Runs the Official W3C XQuery Test Suite (XQTS) against Nux, looking for potential standards conformance bugs; The test suite contains some 15000 test cases; it must be downloaded separately from the W3C site.
 

Package nux.xom.tests Description

Tests and example demos.
